title: Ticket #4231: Schedd should insert unix group and default group name for jobs
description:
Hi Tanya,

I will have to check again with the HTCondor team on their progress. If you
remember, our participation with this program will be highly dependent on
HTCondor's ability to integrate with unix groups so that we can automatically
add ProjectName to submit files for our users.

Best,
Lauren Michael


On Tue, Jan 28, 2014 at 2:29 PM, Tanya Levshina <@fnal.gov> wrote:

    Hi Lauren,

    We haven't somehow followed up on our discussion about GLOW project name
    reporting. For now we have several campuses reporting Project Names and we
    are able to generate various reports based on this information. The project
    names are registered in OIM and are associated with a specific Campus (see
    for example https://oim.grid.iu.edu/oim/campusgrid?id=14 or https://
    oim.grid.iu.edu/oim/campusgrid?id=15). The project name should be an unique
    name for now.

    Miron has asked me to start sending him sites report related to GLOW (see
    below) but it would be also great if we can split the usage further down by
    project and science field.

    Are you planning to revisit this topic?
